p:
The relationship between I S0/I S and C n/3 based on formula (4) are plotted in Fig. 5(B). It can be found that when n value takes 10, the value of linear fitting coefficient R 2 is biggest and linear behavior is best, therefore it reveals Dy 3+ → Sm 3+ energy transfer via quadrupole-quadrupole interaction mechanism, which is consistent with others’ previous investigation
27 .
